name: Soul Keeper (yannmile)
description:
As “The guardian” you must guide the lost souls to the passage of heaven. Your work is not easy because your enemies want to take these souls as well. Will you be able to guide them in time and stop your enemies to reach their goal?  

Movements: W, A, S, D

Music:
Lurking Sloth by Alexander Nakarada  httpswww.serpentsoundstudios.com
Music promoted by httpswww.free-stock-music.com
